body: PlatinumPhoenix Well that's surprising. No wonder a certain doujinshi looked so familar. Speaking of doujinshi, isn't it funny that mangakas have no problem having their work drawn in hentai by other mangakas, but in America, you can't so much as say the name of an artist's character without their permission, or paying them first?
@hentai2317 Perhaps because this artist is the one that makes Maken-ki
I think this one doesn’t have the NTR chapters
The full decensored version already exists and is uploaded, why upload an unfinished one again? Nhentai is and will always be a mystery.
